nodes.text: The Spiverelda was a totalitarian government that ruled the Lambda sector during the Fall of the Republic. When the Andoan Wars erupted between the Spiverelda and the Andoan Free Colonies, the Harch ruling nests sided with the Spiverelda. When the Galactic Republic intervened and supported the Andoan Free Colonies, Spiverelda and the ruling nests were not spared.
